tit.e: Shinkei Sanjurokkaisen (New Forms of Thirty-six Ghosts)

sen.j: 『新形三十六怪撰』（しんけいさんじゅうろっかいせん）は、幕末から明治前期にかけての浮世絵師・月岡芳年による妖怪画の連作。
sen.e: Shinkei Sanjyurokkaisenn is a series of monster pictures by ukiyoe artist Yoshitoshi TSUKIOKA from the late Tokugawa period to the first Meiji period.
Shinkei Sanjurokkaisen is a series of monster pictures by ukiyo-e artist Yoshitoshi TSUKIOKA from the late Edo period to the early Meiji period.
